Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, just west of the city entrance.
Room.LongDescription: The large building marking the Northern Entrance to the city is located to the north. You can leave the city through Evenborough Way, which is located to the east. On the south side of the road is the Evenborough Inn, a popular overnight stop for weary adventurers.
